com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.util
Class Streams

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.prmf.merapi.util.Streams

public class Streams
extends Object

Utility methods for manipulating streams and "streamable" objects.

Author:
Miorel-Lucian Palii

copy

public static void copy(File source,
                        File destination)
                 throws FileNotFoundException,
                        IOException
Copies a file.

Parameters:
source - the file to copy
destination - where to copy to
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - if the source cannot be opened for reading or the destination cannot be opened for writing
IOException - if another I/O error occurs
See Also:
copy(InputStream, File)

copy

public static void copy(InputStream source,
                        File destination,
                        long size)
                 throws IOException
Copies up to the specified number of bytes from a stream to a file.

Parameters:
source - the stream to read from
destination - where to write to
size - the maximum number of bytes to copy
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs
See Also:
copy(InputStream, File)

copy

public static void copy(InputStream source,
                        File destination)
                 throws IOException
Copies a stream to a file. This method is equivalent to Streams.copy(source, destination, Long.MAX_VALUE).

Parameters:
source - the stream to read from
destination - where to write to
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs
See Also:
copy(File, File)
